no_politics: "The personal is the political" may be true, but try to keep matters individual rather than factional. "This new law makes it hard for me to get medicine! I need help getting medicine!" is individual. "The conservative/liberal/minecraft media is restricting my ability to say that all guns have the right to an abortion. I want to whine about YouTube!" is factional. We are here to support each other as individuals, not get in slap fights over hot takes. Those who test the moderators will face consequences.
selfies:
We do not encourage selfies. You post any identifying information about yourself at your own risk. 

 Also reminder that we encourage deleting your selfies after a while for privacy reasons
